舚字的基本解释

舚
tiàn
〔舚舑（
z俷 ）〕吐舌头。单用义同，如“交惊舌互舚。”

舚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiān］
［《廣韻》他念切，去，透。］
［《廣韻》他兼切，平添，透。］
(1)吐舌貌。
(2)以舌取物。

舚字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【舌字部】　舚； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1008第05
【類篇】同䑙。【韓愈·喜侯喜至詩】雜作乗閒騁，交驚舌牙舚。

舚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
舚字的起名意思

暂无。

Worm
Basic explanation of words
Worm
tiàn
〔舚舑（
z 俷)] stick out your tongue. It has the same meaning when used alone, such as "to start each other's tongues."
Worm
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tiān］
["Guang Yun" he reads and cuts, goes to , thoroughly. ]
["Guangyun" he cuts, smooths, and thoroughly. ]
(1) Tongue appearance.
(2) Take things with the tongue.

【Classes】The same as you. 【Han Yu·Xi Hou Xi Zhi Poems】Miscellaneous, taking a leisurely journey, frightened tongues and teeth.
